item.title: Building a manuscript using Bookdown
item.description: The joys and challenges of switching from Word to Bookdown to create a manuscript.

item.title: Using Bookdown: Different authors in a document
item.description: You are working on a manuscript using Bookdown and need to add author information. How do you do it without using the predefined method?
